cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private Twin Room. Te Nikau Lodge is a beautiful character home providing warm hospitality amongst the Nikau Palms. From the car its a two minute walk through the rainforest to Lodge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Queen and single bed with ensuite bathroom. Shared kitchen, lounge and cosy fireplace. Freshly baked bread and brownies baked on a daily basis for sale in this timber home away from home. 2 person maximum.

Deposit only
